metadata.title: CVE-2013-2091 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - untriaged
metadata.description:
SQL injection vulnerability in Dolibarr ERP/CRM 3.3.1 allows remoteattackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the 'pays' parameter infiche.php.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-2091` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

dolibarr - 3.5.8+dfsg1-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dolibarr package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.5.8+dfsg1-1ubuntu1').
